name: Space Invaders GT
description:
Made by:

Albert Dols Ferrandis, Diego Maciá Torregrosa, Raúl Cuadrado Alonso.

This is a Action-Tower Defense Game, in which you command various turrets to defend from threatening waves of spaceships. As a Tower-Defense, you decide which configuration of turrets suits you the most, but you will need to take command of the front if you want to survived the established time!

Controls: 

- Move the mouse to navigate the level, and use the mousewheel to zoom in/zoom out.

 - Select the desired options using the mouse left button, and cancel the current action using the right button.

- Inside a turret, move the mouse to aim, and press the mouse left button to shoot. To go back to the Commander Vision, press Space.

- If you want to pause the game, press P or Escape.

If you find any bug or problem, please contact at: albertdolsferrandis@gmail.com
